text:
Q10.What can be some best suggestions to curb this issue & bring a day where no one thinks twice before calling for an ambulance?
#lane2life
@rituparna201 Someone using the Traffline app found your tweet useful. Download Traffline from http://t.co/M5Ui9kk9vN to find out who

@DinahAshiho @ndtv @Bangalore24 @CPBlr Thats great to hear from you Dinah :)

We all need to follow the same and then see the difference!
RT @saahilsinghal: @TrafflineBLORE difficult question. I believe fire brigade. Lives of many may be preferred over the life of one.

retweeted_status.text: @TrafflineBLORE difficult question. I believe fire brigade. Lives of many may be preferred over the life of one.

text:
